org.db4ospring
Class ObjectContainerFactoryBean

java.lang.Object
  org.db4ospring.ObjectContainerFactoryBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class ObjectContainerFactoryBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.FactoryBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean

Class used for creating an ObjectContainer in a singleton manner as these are thread-safe. The factory bean will try to create using the available properties in the following order:

  1. if databaseFile is set, a local file based client will be created.
  2. if memory file is set, a local memory based client will be created.
  4. if server is set, a client within the same VM as the server will be created.
  5. if all the above fail the client will be opened using hostName, port, user, password to a remote server.

Author:
Costin Leau
